title: SO MILLIONS OF PLAYERS ARE QUITTING LEAGUE. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iqem7TI0XR4
body: I thought i was the only one complaining about the updates, the unbalancing and the rest of the garbage they have added to the game, Nope their are millions. Just watch this for your self https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iqem7TI0XR4

replies.body: Dude makes some valid points, that doesn't necessarily translate to "millions quitting LoL", and there's nothing in that video that provides *any* supporting evidence for that claim.
I see no evidence. It's just as valid as me saying. "Millions of people are joining LOL !!! OMG LOL BECOMING EVEN MORE POPULAR."
Millions and billions and trillions ðŸ™„
Did you even watch it or just trying to discredit the public's opinion. Go to channel comment on the page not here
I wasn't commenting to the public i was commenting to you.
Why to be a smart ass ?
nah just commenting my opinion on your over extradition nothing special.
It's a good video. Riot has indeed made changes for the sake of changes, a lot of gimmicks and reworks. The point about players becoming attached to champions is real.
